thread.title: 5 Night stay while in NY - Review
thread.title_full: 5 Night stay while in NY - Review of SpringHill Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Fifth Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LambypieUK
title: 5 Night stay while in NY - Review
text: Hotel is very good, especially the breakfast. Being English, breakfast is very Important and it saves having to find somewhere to eat every morning. Selection was far more than a continental breakfast. Cannot fault it at all. Room was also very nice. 2nd floor and no noise even with the window open. The gym is also superb. Used it 3 times very good kit and very clean. Towels / water supplied open 24hrs. Highly recommended.
